function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","Impact":"Severe health risks and potential loss of life","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, providing personal protective equipment (PPE), and enforcing social distancing measures","Technologies":"Use of contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, and disinfection technologies","People":"Construction workers, technical engineers, and site personnel","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and government health authorities"},{"Description":"Shortage of construction material supply","Impact":"Delay or halt of construction projects, economic losses, and potential layoffs","Mitigation":"Diversifying supply chains, stockpiling essential materials, and investing in alternative construction methods","Technologies":"Advanced inventory management systems, supply chain optimization software, and 3D printing technologies","People":"Construction industry stakeholders, suppliers, and project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, supply chain managers, and government trade authorities"},{"Description":"Obstruction of construction due to movement restrictions","Impact":"Project delays, cost overruns, and legal complications","Mitigation":"Prioritizing essential projects, obtaining special permits for on-site work, and implementing remote monitoring technologies","Technologies":"Remote monitoring drones, project management software, and virtual reality (VR) simulations","People":"Project managers, construction workers, and government authorities","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and local government authorities"}]}
